author: Willy
content: Be interesting to see what happens if we can rid this country of Trump

author: Rick
content: Bannon won’t come to trial before Trump is out of office. They may end up in the same prison.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
A waste of resources because as soon as he is in jail Trump will pardon him.
But I suppose the government agents don’t get to have a look inside a superyacht every day.

author: Phil
content:
Only a fool from China would ever wear white with black socks & shoes!

The Mystery of the Exiled Billionaire Whistle-Blower

author: Richard Bailey
content: …and its AIS has been disabled for over two months.
